page.title: 17CUSTOMS IN MADDERTY
page.content: On a farm in Madderty when the harvest is finished,they hold a{Harvest Home party. The farmer,his workers and their families have a big meal in the farmhouse. There is a{Harvest {Thanksgiving}in the church in late September or early October. The school has a{Guy Fawkes Night at one of the farmers fields. He makes a Guy for he top of the bonfire. The fire is lit and fireworks are set off. We eat soup,crisps and baked potatoes. On Hogmanay,New Year's Eve people go {First-footing.}It is lucky to be first footed by a tall dark man.He should be the first person to cross over the door after the bells have rung in the New Year. Friends and relatives visit each other and have a party from midnight till the early morning.
